LEONINA71.name: Via Leonina 71
LEONINA71.self_checkin_instructions: Main door: code 7171 + key symbol or round key. Apartment door: long square-ended key, pull door towards you, turn counterclockwise.
LEONINA71.trash_rules: Follow building bins in courtyard; separate glass, plastic, paper as posted.
LEONINA71.appliance_notes: AC: turn off when leaving; Hot plate: switch off after use; Terrace umbrella: tie to railing, close when away.
LEONINA71.boiler_reset_steps: Do not touch the switch near bathroom mirror; hot water always available.
